segments.en: Hello everyone, and welcome to EnglishPod.
segments.cn: 大家好，欢迎来到EnglishPod。

segments.en: My name is Marco.
segments.cn: 我叫Marco。

segments.en: Hi everyone, my name is Catherine, and today we have an elementary level lesson for you.
segments.cn: 大家好，我叫Catherine，今天我们为你们准备了一节初级课程。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: Today we are dealing with a house that is filled with different types of bugs.
segments.cn: 今天我们要处理的是一个充满各种虫子的房子。

segments.en: Ew, bugs.
segments.cn: 呃，虫子。

segments.en: Well, it's summertime, so it's not that uncommon, but not a pleasant thing to deal with.
segments.cn: 嗯，现在是夏天，所以这并不罕见，但处理起来并不愉快。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So we're going to call an exterminator, so you might be asking yourself what that is.
segments.cn: 所以我们要叫灭虫师，你可能会问这是什么。

segments.en: But before we explain, why don't you listen to the dialogue for the first time.
segments.cn: 但在我们解释之前，为什么不先听一次对话呢。

segments.en: Hi, did you call for an exterminator?
segments.cn: 你好，你叫灭虫师吗？

segments.en: Yes, thank goodness you're here.
segments.cn: 是的，感谢你来了。

segments.en: These bugs are driving us crazy.
segments.cn: 这些虫子快把我们逼疯了。

segments.en: What sort of pests are we dealing with?
segments.cn: 我们在处理什么样的害虫？

segments.en: We just bought this house, and it is infected with just about everything.
segments.cn: 我们刚买了这栋房子，里面几乎感染了所有东西。

segments.en: We have termites in the wood, cockroaches all over the place, and last night I saw a huge rat out in the backyard.
segments.cn: 我们的木头里有白蚁，四处都是蟑螂，昨晚我在后院看到一只巨大的老鼠。

segments.en: Well, there's nothing that we can't handle.
segments.cn: 嗯，没有什么是我们处理不了的。

segments.en: I'll spray the floorboards and walls to get rid of the cockroaches, but the termites will be harder to get rid of.
segments.cn: 我会喷洒地板和墙壁来消灭蟑螂，但白蚁会更难处理。

segments.en: We will have to cover the entire house and fumigate it.
segments.cn: 我们必须覆盖整个房子并进行熏蒸。

segments.en: Unfortunately, that means you will have to find a place to stay for the next three days.
segments.cn: 不幸的是，这意味着你需要找个地方住三天。

segments.en: No problem.
segments.cn: 没问题。

segments.en: Just get rid of the bugs.
segments.cn: 只要消灭虫子就行。

segments.en: Alright, we're back, so now we have six keywords that we've chosen out for you.
segments.cn: 好的，我们回来了，现在我们为你们挑选了六个关键词。

segments.en: Let's take a look at those now on Language Takeaway.
segments.cn: 让我们现在在Language Takeaway上看看这些。

segments.en: Well, Marco, you've already told our users the very first word.
segments.cn: 嗯，Marco，你已经告诉我们的用户第一个词了。

segments.en: That would be exterminator.
segments.cn: 那就是灭虫师。

segments.en: What is an exterminator?
segments.cn: 灭虫师是什么？

segments.en: It's a person, right?
segments.cn: 是一个人，对吧？

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: It's a person that has the job to exterminate or to delete or eliminate different types of bugs or pests.
segments.cn: 这是一个负责消灭或清除各种虫子或害虫的人。

segments.en: So an exterminator's job is to kill bugs.
segments.cn: 所以灭虫师的工作就是杀虫子。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: And usually an exterminator comes to your home or your office to do this, right?
segments.cn: 通常灭虫师会到你的家或办公室来做这件事，对吧？

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So maybe in your house you have a lot of different types of bugs.
segments.cn: 所以也许在你的家里有很多不同种类的虫子。

segments.en: Maybe you have, I don't know, spiders.
segments.cn: 也许你有，我不知道，蜘蛛。

segments.en: So an exterminator will come and he will try to get rid of the spiders.
segments.cn: 所以灭虫师会来，他会试图消灭蜘蛛。

segments.en: Great.
segments.cn: 很好。

segments.en: So an exterminator, in a general sense, gets rid of pests.
segments.cn: 所以从一般意义上说，灭虫师消灭害虫。

segments.en: And pest is our next word.
segments.cn: 而害虫是我们的下一个词。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: A pest.
segments.cn: 一种害虫。

segments.en: Now, we're talking about bugs and they can be considered a sort of pest.
segments.cn: 现在，我们在谈论虫子，它们可以被视为一种害虫。

segments.en: Well, pest, though, is a more general term, right?
segments.cn: 嗯，害虫是一个更通用的术语，对吧？

segments.en: So you can say pest about something like rats or mice.
segments.cn: 所以你可以把老鼠或小鼠称为害虫。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So basically some type of animal that is very annoying and also causes some sort of harm or danger.
segments.cn: 所以基本上是某种非常烦人的动物，也会造成某种伤害或危险。

segments.en: Right.
segments.cn: 对。

segments.en: So there was a movie, if I remember correctly, in the 1990s.
segments.cn: 所以如果我没记错的话，90年代有部电影。

segments.en: It was terrible and it was called The Pest.
segments.cn: 它很糟糕，叫做《害虫》。

segments.en: Yeah, that's right.
segments.cn: 是的，没错。

segments.en: And it's all about this person who is very annoying.
segments.cn: 整个故事都是关于一个非常烦人的人。

segments.en: So you can even say an annoying person or a bothersome person is a pest.
segments.cn: 所以你甚至可以说一个烦人的人或一个讨厌的人是害虫。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: You're such a pest.
segments.cn: 你真是个害虫。

segments.en: Okay, so obviously our home is filled with bugs.
segments.cn: 好吧，显然我们的家里充满了虫子。

segments.en: And that's what the person said, that it is infested.
segments.cn: 而那个人说它是感染的。

segments.en: Okay, so a place, like an office building, or like you said, Marco, a home is infested if it is filled with something.
segments.cn: 好吧，像办公大楼，或者像你说的，Marco，家里如果充满了某种东西就被称为感染。

segments.en: And so infested means it's filled with something bad.
segments.cn: 所以感染意味着充满了坏东西。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So in this case, the house is infested with bugs.
segments.cn: 所以在这种情况下，房子里充满了虫子。

segments.en: They're living upstairs, downstairs, in the basement, in the kitchen.
segments.cn: 它们住在楼上、楼下、地下室、厨房。

segments.en: They're everywhere.
segments.cn: 它们无处不在。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: And she said that we, well, actually they have termites in the wood.
segments.cn: 她说我们，实际上是他们的木头里有白蚁。

segments.en: All right, so termites are a special kind of bug that almost always live in wood, right?
segments.cn: 好吧，白蚁是一种特殊的虫子，几乎总是生活在木头里，对吧？

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: They're little bugs that I think eat the wood.
segments.cn: 它们是小虫子，我想是吃木头的。

segments.en: And this is why they're so dangerous, because they make the house weak, because they eat off all the wood that supports it.
segments.cn: 这就是它们如此危险的原因，因为它们使房子变得脆弱，因为它们吃掉支撑房子的所有木头。

segments.en: So we can say the house fell down because it was infested with termites.
segments.cn: 所以我们可以说房子倒塌是因为它被白蚁感染。

segments.en: That's right, termites.
segments.cn: 没错，白蚁。

segments.en: And also we have a very common pest or a bug.
segments.cn: 我们还有一种非常常见的害虫或虫子。

segments.en: We have cockroaches.
segments.cn: 我们有蟑螂。

segments.en: Ugh, I hate these, and they're everywhere this summer.
segments.cn: 呃，我讨厌这些，它们这个夏天到处都是。

segments.en: Cockroaches come in different sizes.
segments.cn: 蟑螂有不同的大小。

segments.en: Some are big, some are small, but they're very, very strong bugs.
segments.cn: 有些大，有些小，但它们都是非常强壮的虫子。

segments.en: They can live through anything.
segments.cn: 它们可以活过任何东西。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: They're small, usually brown, but sometimes I think you can see black cockroaches.
segments.cn: 它们小，通常是棕色的，但有时我觉得你可以看到黑色的蟑螂。

segments.en: That's right, and they love to be near food and decaying things, like garbage bins.
segments.cn: 没错，它们喜欢靠近食物和腐烂的东西，比如垃圾桶。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So a very common type of pest, cockroach.
segments.cn: 所以一种非常常见的害虫，蟑螂。

segments.en: And in order to get rid of termites and cockroaches and all these types of bugs, we have to fumigate the house.
segments.cn: 为了消灭白蚁和蟑螂以及所有这些虫子，我们必须对房子进行熏蒸。

segments.en: Okay, so this is one method that the exterminator uses to kill bugs.
segments.cn: 好吧，这是一种灭虫师用来杀虫子的方式。

segments.en: And like in the dialogue, when you fumigate a house, basically you fill the house with fumes or gases that kill bugs.
segments.cn: 就像在对话中，当你熏蒸一栋房子时，基本上是用气体或烟雾填满房子来杀死虫子。

segments.en: So people, like you and me, we can't be in the house when that happens, right?
segments.cn: 所以像你我这样的人，在那时不能在房子里，对吧？

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: Actually, if you see an exterminator, he will always fumigate wearing a mask so he doesn't inhale those poisonous gas.
segments.cn: 实际上，如果你看到一个灭虫师，他总是会戴上口罩进行熏蒸，以免吸入那些有毒气体。

segments.en: Right, so it's very dangerous for people, and you'll have to make sure you talk to your exterminator to make sure that the gases he's using aren't getting into your body.
segments.cn: 对，所以对人来说非常危险，你必须确保与你的灭虫师沟通，以确保他使用的气体不会进入你的身体。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: Okay, so why don't we listen to the dialogue again, and we'll be back in a bit.
segments.cn: 好吧，为什么我们不再听一次对话，我们很快就会回来。

segments.en: Hi, did you call for an exterminator?
segments.cn: 你好，你叫灭虫师吗？

segments.en: Yes, thank goodness you're here.
segments.cn: 是的，感谢你来了。

segments.en: These bugs are driving us crazy.
segments.cn: 这些虫子快把我们逼疯了。

segments.en: What sort of pests are we dealing with?
segments.cn: 我们在处理什么样的害虫？

segments.en: We just bought this house, and it is infected with just about everything.
segments.cn: 我们刚买了这栋房子，里面几乎感染了所有东西。

segments.en: We have termites in the wood, cockroaches all over the place, and last night I saw a huge rat out in the backyard.
segments.cn: 我们的木头里有白蚁，四处都是蟑螂，昨晚我在后院看到一只巨大的老鼠。

segments.en: Well, there's nothing that we can't handle.
segments.cn: 嗯，没有什么是我们处理不了的。

segments.en: I'll spray the floorboards and walls to get rid of the cockroaches, but the termites will be harder to get rid of.
segments.cn: 我会喷洒地板和墙壁来消灭蟑螂，但白蚁会更难处理。

segments.en: We will have to cover the entire house and fumigate it.
segments.cn: 我们必须覆盖整个房子并进行熏蒸。

segments.en: Unfortunately, that means you will have to find a place to stay for the next three days.
segments.cn: 不幸的是，这意味着你需要找到一个地方住三天。

segments.en: No problem.
segments.cn: 没问题。

segments.en: Just get rid of the bugs.
segments.cn: 只要把虫子处理掉就行。

segments.en: Alright, so now we've chosen three key phrases for you on Fluency Builder.
segments.cn: 好的，现在我们为你选择了三个关键短语用于流利表达构建器。

segments.en: Fluency Builder Well, this first phrase comes from the very beginning of today's dialogue.
segments.cn: 流利表达构建器，第一个短语来自今天对话的开头。

segments.en: The second person in the dialogue says these bugs are driving us crazy.
segments.cn: 对话中的第二个人说这些虫子让我们发疯。

segments.en: So to drive someone crazy.
segments.cn: 所以让某人发疯。

segments.en: Okay, so if you're driving someone crazy, it means that you're making them crazy.
segments.cn: 好吧，如果你让某人发疯，这意味着你让他们疯狂。

segments.en: Alright, so it could be you're making them angry, or you're making them frustrated, but it has nothing to do with cars, right?
segments.cn: 好的，这可能是你让他们生气，或者让他们沮丧，但这与汽车无关，对吧？

segments.en: Yeah, there's no driving involved.
segments.cn: 是的，没有驾驶的意思。

segments.en: So driving here means making.
segments.cn: 所以这里的驾驶意味着制造。

segments.en: You're making me crazy.
segments.cn: 你让我发疯。

segments.en: You're really making me frustrated.
segments.cn: 你真的让我沮丧。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So in this case, the animals, the bugs were driving them crazy.
segments.cn: 所以在这种情况下，动物，虫子让他们发疯。

segments.en: They were so annoying that they were very irritated.
segments.cn: 它们太烦人了，以至于他们非常恼火。

segments.en: So I could do something, Marco, that will drive you crazy.
segments.cn: 所以我可以做一些事情，马尔科，会让你发疯。

segments.en: I could tap, tap, tap, tap, tap, tap, tap.
segments.cn: 我可以轻轻敲打，敲打，敲打，敲打，敲打，敲打。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: That's driving me crazy.
segments.cn: 这让我发疯。

segments.en: Doesn't know you?
segments.cn: 不知道你？

segments.en: Yes, yes.
segments.cn: 是的，是的。

segments.en: So I'll stop so it doesn't drive you crazy anymore.
segments.cn: 所以我会停下来，这样就不会再让你发疯了。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: Okay, so now obviously bugs are driving them crazy.
segments.cn: 好的，显然虫子让他们发疯。

segments.en: And she went on to explain that it's because the house is infested with just about everything.
segments.cn: 她接着解释说，这是因为房子里几乎到处都是虫子。

segments.en: Well, this is a great phrase because we can say it in a lot of different contexts.
segments.cn: 这个短语很好，因为我们可以在很多不同的语境中使用它。

segments.en: In this context, it means there is not everything, every single bug in the house, but just about everything.
segments.cn: 在这个语境中，它的意思是房子里几乎有所有的虫子。

segments.en: That means almost every bug you can think of is in this house.
segments.cn: 这意味着你能想到的几乎所有虫子都在这个房子里。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So it's kind of a way of exaggerating also.
segments.cn: 所以这也是一种夸张的方式。

segments.en: Because obviously, well, they have cockroaches, they have termites, but they're saying we have a lot of different types of bugs.
segments.cn: 因为显然，他们有蟑螂，有白蚁，但他们说我们有很多不同种类的虫子。

segments.en: We have just about everything that you can imagine.
segments.cn: 我们有你能想象的几乎所有东西。

segments.en: You could even say, this restaurant has just about every Chinese dish you could ever think of.
segments.cn: 你甚至可以说，这家餐厅有你能想到的几乎所有中餐。

segments.en: That's not true.
segments.cn: 这不是真的。

segments.en: It doesn't have every single one.
segments.cn: 它并没有每一种。

segments.en: But it has a lot.
segments.cn: 但它有很多。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: Okay, so that's the way that you use just about everything.
segments.cn: 好的，这就是你使用“几乎所有”的方式。

segments.en: And for our final phrase, we used it a little bit earlier on.
segments.cn: 对于我们的最后一个短语，我们稍早使用过。

segments.en: Let's explain it a little bit.
segments.cn: 让我们稍微解释一下。

segments.en: When we're talking about bugs, we want to get rid of bugs.
segments.cn: 当我们谈论虫子时，我们想要处理掉虫子。

segments.en: This is why we call the exterminator, to get rid of the cockroaches.
segments.cn: 这就是我们叫灭虫师来处理蟑螂的原因。

segments.en: You might hear this phrase a lot when you're watching movies about gangsters or mobsters like The Sopranos, the TV show, Get Rid of Him.
segments.cn: 你可能在看关于黑帮或黑手党的电影时经常听到这个短语，比如《黑道家族》，电视节目，处理掉他。

segments.en: Right?
segments.cn: 对吧？

segments.en: So this is a phrase that means, in this case, to kill something or to kill someone, to get rid of it, to get rid of him.
segments.cn: 所以这个短语在这种情况下意味着杀掉某物或某人，处理掉它，处理掉他。

segments.en: To not have it anymore.
segments.cn: 不再拥有它。

segments.en: Right.
segments.cn: 对。

segments.en: So, rid means to get away or to throw away.
segments.cn: 所以，rid意味着摆脱或扔掉。

segments.en: But in this case, you're not just throwing it away, you're killing these bugs.
segments.cn: 但在这种情况下，你不仅仅是扔掉它，你是在杀掉这些虫子。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So we want to get rid of the bugs.
segments.cn: 所以我们想要处理掉虫子。

segments.en: Now, obviously, as you said, we can also throw away.
segments.cn: 现在，显然，正如你所说，我们也可以扔掉。

segments.en: For example, these shoes are too old.
segments.cn: 例如，这些鞋子太旧了。

segments.en: I'm going to get rid of them.
segments.cn: 我打算处理掉它们。

segments.en: Or, hey Marco, this milk smells funny.
segments.cn: 或者，嘿马尔科，这牛奶闻起来很奇怪。

segments.en: Can you get rid of it?
segments.cn: 你能处理掉它吗？

segments.en: Very good.
segments.cn: 非常好。

segments.en: So that's the way that you would use that phrase, to get rid of something.
segments.cn: 所以这就是你使用这个短语，处理掉某物的方式。

segments.en: So why don't we listen to our dialogue for the very last time, and we're back to talk a little bit more.
segments.cn: 那么我们为什么不最后一次听我们的对话，然后再回来聊聊。

segments.en: Well, there's nothing that we can't handle.
segments.cn: 好吧，没有什么是我们无法处理的。

segments.en: I'll spray the floorboards and walls to get rid of the cockroaches, but the termites will be harder to get rid of.
segments.cn: 我会喷洒地板和墙壁来处理掉蟑螂，但白蚁会更难处理。

segments.en: We will have to cover the entire house and fumigate it.
segments.cn: 我们必须覆盖整个房子并进行熏蒸。

segments.en: Unfortunately, that means you will have to find a place to stay for the next three days.
segments.cn: 不幸的是，这意味着你需要找到一个地方住三天。

segments.en: No problem.
segments.cn: 没问题。

segments.en: Just get rid of the bugs.
segments.cn: 只要把虫子处理掉就行。

segments.en: So bugs.
segments.cn: 所以虫子。

segments.en: Everyone loves bugs, right?
segments.cn: 每个人都喜欢虫子，对吧？

segments.en: I don't know.
segments.cn: 我不知道。

segments.en: I'm actually okay with termites, or for example, cockroaches are a little bit weird, but I actually really dislike spiders.
segments.cn: 我其实对白蚁还好，或者说蟑螂有点奇怪，但我真的很讨厌蜘蛛。

segments.en: Really?
segments.cn: 真的？

segments.en: So you're okay with cockroaches, but spiders make you nervous.
segments.cn: 所以你对蟑螂还好，但蜘蛛让你紧张。

segments.en: Yeah, spiders are... Well, the thing is, spiders can actually hurt you.
segments.cn: 是的，蜘蛛是……好吧，问题是，蜘蛛实际上可以伤害你。

segments.en: And cockroaches generally cannot.
segments.cn: 而蟑螂通常不能。

segments.en: They're gross, they're dirty.
segments.cn: 它们很恶心，很脏。

segments.en: But spiders, there are very, very many kinds of dangerous spiders out there that are poisonous.
segments.cn: 但蜘蛛，有很多种危险的蜘蛛是有毒的。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So for example, termites, nothing's going to happen.
segments.cn: 所以例如，白蚁，没什么会发生。

segments.en: Or cockroaches, they're nasty.
segments.cn: 或者蟑螂，它们很讨厌。

segments.en: Well, not unless your house is weakened by hundreds of millions of termites.
segments.cn: 好吧，除非你的房子被数以亿计的白蚁侵蚀。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: But for example, I think other people have snakes sometimes as pests.
segments.cn: 但例如，我认为其他人有时会把蛇当作害虫。

segments.en: Because they live in areas that have a lot of snakes, or mice, because snakes are attracted by mice.
segments.cn: 因为他们生活在有很多蛇的地方，或者老鼠，因为蛇会被老鼠吸引。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So some people keep cats for that reason.
segments.cn: 所以有些人出于这个原因养猫。

segments.en: They want the cats, especially on farms, the cats to catch the mice.
segments.cn: 他们希望猫，尤其是在农场上，猫能抓老鼠。

segments.en: Or to scare the snakes away.
segments.cn: 或者吓跑蛇。

segments.en: But I don't really have a problem with snakes or spiders, but I do have a problem with scorpions.
segments.cn: 但我对蛇或蜘蛛没有太大问题，但我确实对蝎子有问题。

segments.en: Oh, scorpions.
segments.cn: 哦，蝎子。

segments.en: If you live close to a desert or very dry area, scorpions, they really scare me.
segments.cn: 如果你住在靠近沙漠或非常干燥的地方，蝎子真的让我害怕。

segments.en: I've seen on, I think, Discovery Channel that in Australia they're very common.
segments.cn: 我在发现频道上看到过，在澳大利亚它们非常常见。

segments.en: And so, not only scorpions, but also spiders.
segments.cn: 所以，不仅是蝎子，还有蜘蛛。

segments.en: So whenever you put your shoes on, you have to check that there's nothing in it.
segments.cn: 所以每当你穿鞋时，你必须检查里面有没有东西。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: Also, shower drains.
segments.cn: 还有淋浴排水口。

segments.en: You know where the water goes down the hole in the shower?
segments.cn: 你知道水是如何流入淋浴的洞里吗？

segments.en: Often times you get things like scorpions in the desert areas that come out of the drains.
segments.cn: 经常会有像蝎子这样的东西从沙漠地区的排水口出来。

segments.en: Really?
segments.cn: 真的？

segments.en: Oh wow, that looks like something from a horror movie or something.
segments.cn: 哦，哇，那看起来像是恐怖电影里的东西。

segments.en: Yeah, and all of a sudden you're in the shower and there's pests coming out of the drains.
segments.cn: 是的，突然间你在淋浴时，害虫从排水口出来。

segments.en: Yeah, that's nasty.
segments.cn: 是啊，那太恶心了。

segments.en: Terrifying.
segments.cn: 令人恐惧。

segments.en: Alright, so a lot of different types of kind of scary bugs and pests.
segments.cn: 好吧，有很多不同类型的可怕虫子和害虫。

segments.en: But we would like to know if you've ever had an infestation in your home, or what pests are you afraid of?
segments.cn: 但我们想知道你家里有没有过虫害，或者你害怕什么害虫？

segments.en: So let us know.
segments.cn: 所以请告诉我们。

segments.en: Our website is EnglishPod.com.
segments.cn: 我们的网站是 EnglishPod.com。

segments.en: We hope to see you there.
segments.cn: 希望在那里见到你。

segments.en: Alright, we'll see you guys next time.
segments.cn: 好吧，下次见。

segments.en: Bye.
segments.cn: 再见。
